Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Nevsky Hotel Grand, you'll be centrally located in St. Petersburg, steps from Arkady Raykin Variety Theater and Saint Petersburg Printing Museum. This hotel is within close proximity of Museum of Soviet Arcade Games and Kazan Cathedral.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 137 air-conditioned rooms featuring plasma televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include safes and desks, as well as phones with free local calls.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, a hair salon, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include limo/town car service, express check-in, and express check-out. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours).


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, a hair salon, and tour/ticket assistance.
Make yourself at home in one of the 137 air-conditioned rooms featuring plasma televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include safes and desks, as well as phones with free local calls.

With a stay at Nevsky Hotel Grand, you'll be centrally located in St. Petersburg, steps from Arkady Raykin Variety Theater and Saint Petersburg Printing Museum. This hotel is within close proximity of Museum of Soviet Arcade Games and Kazan Cathedral.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Arkady Raykin Variety Theater - 0 km / 0 mi
Saint Petersburg Printing Museum - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Museum of Soviet Arcade Games - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Kazan Cathedral - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Mussorgsky Opera and Ballet Theatre - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Brodsky House Museum - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Mikhailovsky Theatre - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Church of the Savior on the Spilled Blood - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Alexander Pushkin Museum and Memorial Apartment - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
St. Petersburg Philharmonia - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Shostakovich Philharmonic Hall - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Cigar Museum - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Museum of Bladed Weapons - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Gostiny Dvor - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
State Russian Museum - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi

The preferred airport for Nevsky Hotel Grand is St. Petersburg (LED-Pulkovo) - 15.8 km / 9.8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Nevsky Hotel Grand is St. Petersburg (LED-Pulkovo) - 15.8 km / 9.8 mi.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometre.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text:
Essential Information: Room 1

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Hotel Tariff Notes: Early departure 100% will be charged. All people with citizenship other than Russian are required to be registered with local immigration authorities and should pay for it the local registration service fee 4 EURO per person / per stay directly to the hotel upon check in. Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding, no separate bed for children is provided unless otherwise stated. Note: The elevator will not work from 29.10.18 till 29.11.18.
